subject: Question about the quietness of the vam and vam pro
description_text:
Hi, im considering buying your plus X pedals and 2 vibration motors either
the vam or vam pro but I'm just concerned about how loud they are.
I mainly play at night with headphones and my parents are in the room
across from me so i need to keep volume to a minimum, would you still
recommend the vam, vam pro or maybe just without them entirely?

Kind regards
Luke

conversations.body_text: Hi Luke G.,  You may opt for the VAM Rumble, which produces less noise and is perfectly adequate. However, the VAM Pro, when mounted horizontally, also generates minimal noise while offering superior build quality and feedback. You may select the model that best suits your requirements.

I see ok i think ill go for the standard vam then. Don't suppose theres an
option to order 2 + power supply rather than the set of 3? As I'm only
getting the brake and accelerator. Would i be able to get a discount if i
ask for one to be removed?

Unfortunately, this set is currently only sold in the 3-piece configuration and we’re unable to remove onel. All of our overseas warehouses stock this exact set, so we can’t split it into a 2-piece + power supply option. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
Ok no worries thanks for the help!
Hi Luke G.,    You can use this store discount to enjoy a $20 discount: FFLV20  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=50297651003706
